Sean Sperte

Apple updates Apple ID site, finally allows editing

29 November 2006

Apple updates Apple ID site, finally allows editing. This could be the straw the broke the camels back for me. I’ve been wanting to drop .Mac for years now, but always lemented that my Apple ID would have to remain my mac.com email address. [UPDATE: Scratch that. It seems that .Mac users still cannot change their ID.]
